mapper.insert: INSERT INTO culturefacility(cultureno, cname ,raddress,lattitude, longitude, addr_code, phone, date, operatingtime, pa) VALUES (culturefacility_seq.nextval,#{cname}, #{raddress}, #{lattitude}, #{longitude}, #{addr_code}, #{phone}, sysdate, #{operatingtime}, #{pa})
mapper.select: SELECT cname, raddress,lattitude,longitude,addr_code,phone,date,operatingtime,pa FROM culturefacility ORDER BY cultureno ASC
